import React from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { BriefcaseIcon, UserGroupIcon, ChartBarIcon, SparklesIcon, ArrowRightIcon, CheckCircleIcon } from '@heroicons/react/24/outline'; const Home = () => { const features = [ { icon: SparklesIcon, title: 'AI-Powered Matching', description: 'Advanced NLP algorithms analyze resumes and job descriptions for perfect matches.' }, { icon: ChartBarIcon, title: 'Detailed Analytics', description: 'Get comprehensive similarity scores and detailed match insights.' }, { icon: UserGroupIcon, title: 'Dual Interface', description: 'Separate dashboards for recruiters and job seekers for optimal user experience.' }, { icon: BriefcaseIcon, title: 'Professional Results', description: 'Clean, professional interface with actionable recruitment insights.' } ]; const stats = [ { label: 'Match Accuracy', value: '95%' }, { label: 'Time Saved', value: '80%' }, { label: 'Processing Speed', value: '<5s' }, { label: 'File Formats', value: '4+' } ]; return (
